metadata.title: CVE-2017-9233 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: XML External Entity vulnerability in libexpat 2.2.0 and earlier (Expat XML Parser Library) allows attackers to put the parser in an infinite loop using a malformed external entity definition from an external DTD.

notes.note: mdeslaur> we will not be fixing this in thunderbird, marking as ignored

criterions.comment: coin3 package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.0.0~CMake~6f54f1602475+ds1-2').
expat package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.2.1-2').
firefox package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '67.0.4+build1-0ubuntu1').
matanza package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
swish-e package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
thunderbird package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '60.7.2+build2-0ubuntu1').
